purpose_output_goal: Evaluate Windows servers against CIS 2019 L1 benchmarks; store evidence.
data_sources: WinRM/PowerShell, OSQuery (Windows build), Cloud Config APIs for IaaS, WinRM, OSQuery
auth_strategy: Machine creds or agent keys in Vault kv/tenants/<tenant>/grc
success_criteria: ≥95% controls evaluated; pass/fail computed; evidence exportable for audit.
failure_modes: Evidence missing; schema mismatch; agent gaps; timeout.
telemetry_schema_notes: control_evidence(control_id text, host_id uuid, result text, evidence jsonb, ts timestamptz) partitioned by day
expected_artifacts: Compliance CSV/PDF, evidence bundle, control summary; Raw compliance_results export; Raw control_evidence export
rollback_plan: Skip failing controls; keep last known pass; rescan overnight; alert GRC.

purpose_output_goal: Map exposed services and policy misconfigurations across perimeter firewalls and DMZ.
data_sources: Panorama API, Nmap TCP/UDP, SNMPv3 on edge devices
auth_strategy: Panorama API key per tenant; SNMPv3 authPriv; all secrets in Vault; source IP allow-listed.
success_criteria: ≥90% subnet coverage; port/service inventory updated; policy anomalies flagged.
failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.
telemetry_schema_notes: network_findings(id uuid pk, tenant_id, ip inet, port int, svc text, severity text, meta jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Ingest IOCs from MISP and correlate with assets/findings to raise risk signals.
data_sources: MISP REST API, OTX, NVD CVE API
auth_strategy: API keys per tenant stored in Vault; request signing where supported; rotate every 90 days.
success_criteria: Feeds <15 min stale; correlation jobs produce matches; bounded alert volume.
failure_modes: Feed lag; parse errors; correlation stalled; quota exceeded.
telemetry_schema_notes: ti_indicators(type text, value text, source text, ts) + bloom filter on value
expected_artifacts: IOC freshness log, correlation summary, risk alerts
rollback_plan: Disable problematic feed; fall back to last indicators; retry with jitter; alert SecOps.

purpose_output_goal: Ingest IOCs from MISP and correlate with assets/findings to raise risk signals.
data_sources: MISP REST API, OTX, NVD CVE API, MISP, NVD
auth_strategy: API keys per tenant in Vault kv/tenants/<tenant>/ti
success_criteria: Feeds <15 min stale; correlation jobs produce matches; bounded alert volume.
failure_modes: Feed lag; parse errors; correlation stalled; quota exceeded.
telemetry_schema_notes: ti_indicators(type text, value text, source text, ts) + bloom filter on value; ti_indicators(type,value,source,ts); ti_indicators(type,value,source,ts) bloom(value)
expected_artifacts: IOC freshness log, correlation summary, risk alerts
rollback_plan: Disable problematic feed; fall back to last indicators; retry with jitter; alert SecOps.

purpose_output_goal: Discover accounts, resources, and misconfigurations across AWS Organizations.
data_sources: AWS Organizations, Config, Security Hub, IAM APIs
auth_strategy: Cross‑account IAM role with external ID; short‑lived creds; brokered via Vault AWS engine.
success_criteria: All target accounts reachable; throttling handled; misconfigs triaged.
failure_modes: Role trust broken; throttling >30m; API quota exceeded; region denies.
telemetry_schema_notes: cloud_assets(account_id text, resource_arn text, config jsonb) + idx(account_id)
expected_artifacts: Account inventory, misconfiguration report, throttle dashboard; Raw cloud_accounts export; Raw cloud_assets export; Raw cloud_findings export
rollback_plan: Pause offending account; keep last snapshot; retry with backoff; alert CloudOps.

purpose_output_goal: Evaluate Windows servers against CIS 2019 L1 benchmarks; store evidence.
data_sources: WinRM/PowerShell, OSQuery (Windows build), Cloud Config APIs for IaaS
auth_strategy: Machine creds via AD or agent keys; Vault‑managed; rotation 60 days.
success_criteria: ≥95% controls evaluated; pass/fail computed; evidence exportable for audit.
failure_modes: Evidence missing; schema mismatch; agent gaps; timeout.
telemetry_schema_notes: control_evidence(control_id text, host_id uuid, result text, evidence jsonb, ts timestamptz) partitioned by day
expected_artifacts: Compliance CSV/PDF, evidence bundle, control summary; Raw compliance_results export; Raw control_evidence export
rollback_plan: Skip failing controls; keep last known pass; rescan overnight; alert GRC.

success_criteria: Feeds <15 min stale; correlation jobs produce matches; bounded alert volume.
failure_modes: Feed lag; parse errors; correlation stalled; quota exceeded.
telemetry_schema_notes: ti_indicators(type text, value text, source text, ts) + bloom filter on value
expected_artifacts: IOC freshness log, correlation summary, risk alerts
rollback_plan: Disable problematic feed; fall back to last indicators; retry with jitter; alert SecOps.

purpose_output_goal: Map exposed services and policy misconfigurations across perimeter firewalls and DMZ.
data_sources: Panorama API, Nmap TCP/UDP, SNMPv3 on edge devices
auth_strategy: Panorama API key per tenant; SNMPv3 authPriv; all secrets in Vault; source IP allow-listed.
success_criteria: ≥90% subnet coverage; port/service inventory updated; policy anomalies flagged.
failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.
telemetry_schema_notes: network_findings(id uuid pk, tenant_id, ip inet, port int, svc text, severity text, meta jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Provide tenant isolation, role-based access control, and audit logging for all services.
data_sources: Postgres (tenants, users, roles), Internal Admin API, Audit logger
auth_strategy: Vault AppRole for platform services; DB creds via Vault dynamic secrets (TTL 1h).
success_criteria: RBAC enforced; audit events for all admin actions; zero cross-tenant data leakage in tests.
failure_modes: Missing audit records; policy bypass; schema drift breaking auth; healthcheck failing.
telemetry_schema_notes: audit_logs(event_ts timestamptz, actor_id uuid, action text, target text, meta jsonb) with GIN(meta)
expected_artifacts: API healthchecks, RBAC policies, audit-log sample dataset
rollback_plan: Revert to last stable schema migration; disable new policy routes; restore last secrets version.

expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export; Raw svc_inventory export; Raw task_schedules export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Learn golden process baselines per host and alert on anomalies/drift.
data_sources: Lightweight Linux agent; SSH (fallback)
auth_strategy: Mutual‑TLS agent certs issued per tenant; certs in Vault PKI; strict revocation.
success_criteria: Baselines converge; meaningful anomalies <2% false positives; alerts delivered.
failure_modes: Agent heartbeat gaps; out-of-date baseline; clock skew; SSH fallback failure.
telemetry_schema_notes: proc_snapshots(host_id uuid, ts timestamptz, processes jsonb) + idx(host_id, ts)
expected_artifacts: Baseline snapshot, anomaly alerts, drift summary
rollback_plan: Freeze baseline version; suppress noisy signatures; re-learn window 24h.

purpose_output_goal: Evaluate Windows servers against CIS 2019 L1 benchmarks; store evidence.
data_sources: WinRM/PowerShell, OSQuery (Windows build), Cloud Config APIs for IaaS
auth_strategy: Machine creds via AD or agent keys; Vault‑managed; rotation 60 days.
success_criteria: ≥95% controls evaluated; pass/fail computed; evidence exportable for audit.
failure_modes: Evidence missing; schema mismatch; agent gaps; timeout.
telemetry_schema_notes: control_evidence(control_id text, host_id uuid, result text, evidence jsonb, ts timestamptz) partitioned by day
expected_artifacts: Compliance CSV/PDF, evidence bundle, control summary; Raw compliance_results export; Raw control_evidence export
rollback_plan: Skip failing controls; keep last known pass; rescan overnight; alert GRC.

purpose_output_goal: Discover accounts, resources, and misconfigurations across AWS Organizations.
data_sources: AWS Organizations, Config, Security Hub, IAM APIs
auth_strategy: Cross‑account IAM role with external ID; short‑lived creds; brokered via Vault AWS engine.
success_criteria: All target accounts reachable; throttling handled; misconfigs triaged.
failure_modes: Role trust broken; throttling >30m; API quota exceeded; region denies.
integration_endpoints: sts:AssumeRole (arn:aws:iam::<acct>:role/TenantraAudit), https://api.aws.amazon.com/; sts:AssumeRole arn:aws:iam::<acct>:role/TenantraAudit; https://management.azure.com/; https://api.aws.amazon.com/; https://cloudresourcemanager.googleapis.com/
telemetry_schema_notes: cloud_assets(account_id text, resource_arn text, config jsonb) + idx(account_id); aws_config_snapshots(raw jsonb) partition by day
expected_artifacts: Account inventory, misconfiguration report, throttle dashboard; Raw cloud_accounts export; Raw cloud_assets export; Raw cloud_findings export
rollback_plan: Pause offending account; keep last snapshot; retry with backoff; alert CloudOps.

purpose_output_goal: Learn golden process baselines per host and alert on anomalies/drift.
data_sources: Lightweight Linux agent; SSH (fallback)
auth_strategy: Mutual‑TLS agent certs issued per tenant; certs in Vault PKI; strict revocation.
success_criteria: Baselines converge; meaningful anomalies <2% false positives; alerts delivered.
failure_modes: Agent heartbeat gaps; out-of-date baseline; clock skew; SSH fallback failure.
telemetry_schema_notes: proc_snapshots(host_id uuid, ts timestamptz, processes jsonb) + idx(host_id, ts)
expected_artifacts: Baseline snapshot, anomaly alerts, drift summary
rollback_plan: Freeze baseline version; suppress noisy signatures; re-learn window 24h.

telemetry_tables: network_assets, network_findings, firewall_policies, fs_paths, fs_acl, fs_findings
success_criteria: ≥90% subnet coverage; port/service inventory updated; policy anomalies flagged.
failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.
integration_endpoints: https://panorama/api/; nmap://scanner; snmpv3://edge-fw; smb://<host>/<share>; winrm://<host>; ssh://<host>
telemetry_schema_notes: network_findings(id uuid pk, tenant_id, ip inet, port int, svc text, severity text, meta jsonb); fs_paths(path text), fs_acl(sid text, rights text) + gin(path); fs_acl(path text, sid text, rights text, inherited bool, meta jsonb) gin(path)
expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export; Raw fs_paths export; Raw fs_acl export; Raw fs_findings export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Learn golden process baselines per host and alert on anomalies/drift.
data_sources: Lightweight Linux agent; SSH (fallback)
auth_strategy: Mutual‑TLS agent certs issued per tenant; certs in Vault PKI; strict revocation.
success_criteria: Baselines converge; meaningful anomalies <2% false positives; alerts delivered.
failure_modes: Agent heartbeat gaps; out-of-date baseline; clock skew; SSH fallback failure.
telemetry_schema_notes: proc_snapshots(host_id uuid, ts timestamptz, processes jsonb) + idx(host_id, ts)
expected_artifacts: Baseline snapshot, anomaly alerts, drift summary
rollback_plan: Freeze baseline version; suppress noisy signatures; re-learn window 24h.

purpose_output_goal: Inventory Windows services/tasks and flag anomalous states and autostarts.
data_sources: WinRM, WMI, PowerShell Remoting
auth_strategy: AD delegated service account (JEA); secrets managed in Vault; PAM rotation.
success_criteria: Service/task inventory complete; start‑type/state drift flagged; low alert noise.
failure_modes: WinRM unreachable; RPC/COM failures; permissions denied.
telemetry_schema_notes: svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, start_type, state, bin_path) + idx(host_id, svc_name)
expected_artifacts: Service inventory CSV, drift alerts, failures report; Raw svc_inventory export; Raw task_schedules export
rollback_plan: Retain last good inventory; mark host stale; reattempt next hour.

success_criteria: ≥90% subnet coverage; port/service inventory updated; policy anomalies flagged.
failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.
telemetry_schema_notes: network_findings(id uuid pk, tenant_id, ip inet, port int, svc text, severity text, meta jsonb); svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, state) + idx(host_id, svc_name); svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, start_type, state) idx(host_id,svc_name)
expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export; Raw svc_inventory export; Raw task_schedules export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Learn golden process baselines per host and alert on anomalies/drift.
data_sources: Lightweight Linux agent; SSH (fallback)
auth_strategy: Mutual‑TLS agent certs issued per tenant; certs in Vault PKI; strict revocation.
success_criteria: Baselines converge; meaningful anomalies <2% false positives; alerts delivered.
failure_modes: Agent heartbeat gaps; out-of-date baseline; clock skew; SSH fallback failure.
telemetry_schema_notes: proc_snapshots(host_id uuid, ts timestamptz, processes jsonb) + idx(host_id, ts)
expected_artifacts: Baseline snapshot, anomaly alerts, drift summary
rollback_plan: Freeze baseline version; suppress noisy signatures; re-learn window 24h.

purpose_output_goal: Discover accounts, resources, and misconfigurations across AWS Organizations.
data_sources: AWS Organizations, Config, Security Hub, IAM APIs
auth_strategy: Cross‑account IAM role with external ID; short‑lived creds; brokered via Vault AWS engine.
success_criteria: All target accounts reachable; throttling handled; misconfigs triaged.
failure_modes: Role trust broken; throttling >30m; API quota exceeded; region denies.
telemetry_schema_notes: cloud_assets(account_id text, resource_arn text, config jsonb) + idx(account_id); azure_resources(raw jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Account inventory, misconfiguration report, throttle dashboard; Raw cloud_accounts export; Raw cloud_assets export; Raw cloud_findings export
rollback_plan: Pause offending account; keep last snapshot; retry with backoff; alert CloudOps.

rollback_plan: Pause offending account; keep last snapshot; retry with backoff; alert CloudOps.

purpose_output_goal: Inventory Windows services/tasks and flag anomalous states and autostarts.
data_sources: WinRM, WMI, PowerShell Remoting, WinRM/WMI/PowerShell
auth_strategy: AD delegated service account (JEA) in Vault kv/tenants/<tenant>/winops
success_criteria: Service/task inventory complete; start‑type/state drift flagged; low alert noise.
failure_modes: WinRM unreachable; RPC/COM failures; permissions denied.
telemetry_schema_notes: svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, start_type, state, bin_path) + idx(host_id, svc_name); svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, state) + idx(host_id, svc_name); svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, start_type, state) idx(host_id,svc_name)
expected_artifacts: Service inventory CSV, drift alerts, failures report; Raw svc_inventory export; Raw task_schedules export
rollback_plan: Retain last good inventory; mark host stale; reattempt next hour.

purpose_output_goal: Map exposed services and policy misconfigurations across perimeter firewalls and DMZ.
data_sources: Panorama API, Nmap TCP/UDP, SNMPv3 on edge devices
auth_strategy: Panorama API key per tenant; SNMPv3 authPriv; all secrets in Vault; source IP allow-listed.
success_criteria: ≥90% subnet coverage; port/service inventory updated; policy anomalies flagged.
failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.
telemetry_schema_notes: network_findings(id uuid pk, tenant_id, ip inet, port int, svc text, severity text, meta jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Inventory SMB shares, enumerate ACLs, and flag sensitive/excessive permissions.
data_sources: WinRM (CIM/WMI), SMB enumeration, Agent (optional)
auth_strategy: Delegated AD service account (JEA scope) stored in Vault; no domain admin; PAM rotation.
success_criteria: Key shares scanned; ACL drift detected; sensitive paths flagged with evidence.
failure_modes: Access denied; root share offline; scan timeout; agent offline.
telemetry_schema_notes: fs_acl(path text, sid text, rights text, inherited bool, meta jsonb) with GIN(path)
expected_artifacts: Share inventory CSV, ACL findings report, sensitive paths list; Raw fs_paths export; Raw fs_acl export; Raw fs_findings export
rollback_plan: Keep last metadata snapshot; mark host stale; retry window 2h; alert Storage team.

purpose_output_goal: Provide tenant isolation, role-based access control, and audit logging for all services.
data_sources: Postgres (tenants, users, roles), Internal Admin API, Audit logger
auth_strategy: Vault AppRole for platform services; DB creds via Vault dynamic secrets (TTL 1h).
success_criteria: RBAC enforced; audit events for all admin actions; zero cross-tenant data leakage in tests.
failure_modes: Missing audit records; policy bypass; schema drift breaking auth; healthcheck failing.
telemetry_schema_notes: audit_logs(event_ts timestamptz, actor_id uuid, action text, target text, meta jsonb) with GIN(meta)
expected_artifacts: API healthchecks, RBAC policies, audit-log sample dataset
rollback_plan: Revert to last stable schema migration; disable new policy routes; restore last secrets version.

purpose_output_goal: Inventory Windows services/tasks and flag anomalous states and autostarts.
data_sources: WinRM, WMI, PowerShell Remoting
auth_strategy: AD delegated service account (JEA); secrets managed in Vault; PAM rotation.
success_criteria: Service/task inventory complete; start‑type/state drift flagged; low alert noise.
failure_modes: WinRM unreachable; RPC/COM failures; permissions denied.
telemetry_schema_notes: svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, start_type, state, bin_path) + idx(host_id, svc_name)
expected_artifacts: Service inventory CSV, drift alerts, failures report; Raw svc_inventory export; Raw task_schedules export
rollback_plan: Retain last good inventory; mark host stale; reattempt next hour.

purpose_output_goal: Evaluate Windows servers against CIS 2019 L1 benchmarks; store evidence.
data_sources: WinRM/PowerShell, OSQuery (Windows build), Cloud Config APIs for IaaS
auth_strategy: Machine creds via AD or agent keys; Vault‑managed; rotation 60 days.
success_criteria: ≥95% controls evaluated; pass/fail computed; evidence exportable for audit.
failure_modes: Evidence missing; schema mismatch; agent gaps; timeout.
telemetry_schema_notes: control_evidence(control_id text, host_id uuid, result text, evidence jsonb, ts timestamptz) partitioned by day
expected_artifacts: Compliance CSV/PDF, evidence bundle, control summary; Raw compliance_results export; Raw control_evidence export
rollback_plan: Skip failing controls; keep last known pass; rescan overnight; alert GRC.

purpose_output_goal: Discover accounts, resources, and misconfigurations across AWS Organizations.
data_sources: AWS Organizations, Config, Security Hub, IAM APIs
auth_strategy: Cross‑account IAM role with external ID; short‑lived creds; brokered via Vault AWS engine.
success_criteria: All target accounts reachable; throttling handled; misconfigs triaged.
failure_modes: Role trust broken; throttling >30m; API quota exceeded; region denies.
telemetry_schema_notes: cloud_assets(account_id text, resource_arn text, config jsonb) + idx(account_id); azure_resources(raw jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Account inventory, misconfiguration report, throttle dashboard; Raw cloud_accounts export; Raw cloud_assets export; Raw cloud_findings export
rollback_plan: Pause offending account; keep last snapshot; retry with backoff; alert CloudOps.

purpose_output_goal: Discover accounts, resources, and misconfigurations across AWS Organizations.

expected_artifacts: Account inventory, misconfiguration report, throttle dashboard; Raw cloud_accounts export; Raw cloud_assets export; Raw cloud_findings export

purpose_output_goal: Inventory SMB shares, enumerate ACLs, and flag sensitive/excessive permissions.
data_sources: WinRM (CIM/WMI), SMB enumeration, Agent (optional)
auth_strategy: Delegated AD service account (JEA scope) stored in Vault; no domain admin; PAM rotation.
success_criteria: Key shares scanned; ACL drift detected; sensitive paths flagged with evidence.
failure_modes: Access denied; root share offline; scan timeout; agent offline.
telemetry_schema_notes: fs_acl(path text, sid text, rights text, inherited bool, meta jsonb) with GIN(path)
expected_artifacts: Share inventory CSV, ACL findings report, sensitive paths list; Raw fs_paths export; Raw fs_acl export; Raw fs_findings export
rollback_plan: Keep last metadata snapshot; mark host stale; retry window 2h; alert Storage team.

purpose_output_goal: Provide tenant isolation, role-based access control, and audit logging for all services.
data_sources: Postgres (tenants, users, roles), Internal Admin API, Audit logger
auth_strategy: Vault AppRole for platform services; DB creds via Vault dynamic secrets (TTL 1h).
success_criteria: RBAC enforced; audit events for all admin actions; zero cross-tenant data leakage in tests.
failure_modes: Missing audit records; policy bypass; schema drift breaking auth; healthcheck failing.
telemetry_schema_notes: audit_logs(event_ts timestamptz, actor_id uuid, action text, target text, meta jsonb) with GIN(meta)
expected_artifacts: API healthchecks, RBAC policies, audit-log sample dataset
rollback_plan: Revert to last stable schema migration; disable new policy routes; restore last secrets version.

rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Map exposed services and policy misconfigurations across perimeter firewalls and DMZ.
data_sources: Panorama API, Nmap TCP/UDP, SNMPv3 on edge devices
auth_strategy: Panorama API key per tenant; SNMPv3 authPriv; all secrets in Vault; source IP allow-listed.
success_criteria: ≥90% subnet coverage; port/service inventory updated; policy anomalies flagged.
failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.

purpose_output_goal: Inventory Windows services/tasks and flag anomalous states and autostarts.
data_sources: WinRM, WMI, PowerShell Remoting, WinRM/WMI/PowerShell
auth_strategy: AD delegated service account (JEA) in Vault kv/tenants/<tenant>/winops
success_criteria: Service/task inventory complete; start‑type/state drift flagged; low alert noise.
failure_modes: WinRM unreachable; RPC/COM failures; permissions denied.
telemetry_schema_notes: svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, start_type, state, bin_path) + idx(host_id, svc_name); svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, state) + idx(host_id, svc_name); svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, start_type, state) idx(host_id,svc_name)
expected_artifacts: Service inventory CSV, drift alerts, failures report; Raw svc_inventory export; Raw task_schedules export
rollback_plan: Retain last good inventory; mark host stale; reattempt next hour.

success_criteria: Service/task inventory complete; start‑type/state drift flagged; low alert noise.
failure_modes: WinRM unreachable; RPC/COM failures; permissions denied.
telemetry_schema_notes: svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, start_type, state, bin_path) + idx(host_id, svc_name); svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, state) + idx(host_id, svc_name)
expected_artifacts: Service inventory CSV, drift alerts, failures report; Raw svc_inventory export; Raw task_schedules export
rollback_plan: Retain last good inventory; mark host stale; reattempt next hour.

purpose_output_goal: Map exposed services and policy misconfigurations across perimeter firewalls and DMZ.
data_sources: Panorama API, Nmap TCP/UDP, SNMPv3 on edge devices
auth_strategy: Panorama API key per tenant; SNMPv3 authPriv; all secrets in Vault; source IP allow-listed.
success_criteria: ≥90% subnet coverage; port/service inventory updated; policy anomalies flagged.
failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.
telemetry_schema_notes: network_findings(id uuid pk, tenant_id, ip inet, port int, svc text, severity text, meta jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Provide tenant isolation, role-based access control, and audit logging for all services.
data_sources: Postgres (tenants, users, roles), Internal Admin API, Audit logger
auth_strategy: Vault AppRole for platform services; DB creds via Vault dynamic secrets (TTL 1h).
success_criteria: RBAC enforced; audit events for all admin actions; zero cross-tenant data leakage in tests.
failure_modes: Missing audit records; policy bypass; schema drift breaking auth; healthcheck failing.
telemetry_schema_notes: audit_logs(event_ts timestamptz, actor_id uuid, action text, target text, meta jsonb) with GIN(meta)
expected_artifacts: API healthchecks, RBAC policies, audit-log sample dataset
rollback_plan: Revert to last stable schema migration; disable new policy routes; restore last secrets version.

purpose_output_goal: Learn golden process baselines per host and alert on anomalies/drift.
data_sources: Lightweight Linux agent; SSH (fallback)
auth_strategy: Mutual‑TLS agent certs issued per tenant; certs in Vault PKI; strict revocation.
success_criteria: Baselines converge; meaningful anomalies <2% false positives; alerts delivered.
failure_modes: Agent heartbeat gaps; out-of-date baseline; clock skew; SSH fallback failure.
telemetry_schema_notes: proc_snapshots(host_id uuid, ts timestamptz, processes jsonb) + idx(host_id, ts)
expected_artifacts: Baseline snapshot, anomaly alerts, drift summary
rollback_plan: Freeze baseline version; suppress noisy signatures; re-learn window 24h.

auth_strategy: AD delegated service account (JEA); secrets managed in Vault; PAM rotation.
success_criteria: Service/task inventory complete; start‑type/state drift flagged; low alert noise.
failure_modes: WinRM unreachable; RPC/COM failures; permissions denied.
telemetry_schema_notes: svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, start_type, state, bin_path) + idx(host_id, svc_name)
expected_artifacts: Service inventory CSV, drift alerts, failures report; Raw svc_inventory export; Raw task_schedules export
rollback_plan: Retain last good inventory; mark host stale; reattempt next hour.

purpose_output_goal: Map exposed services and policy misconfigurations across perimeter firewalls and DMZ.
data_sources: Panorama API, Nmap TCP/UDP, SNMPv3 on edge devices
auth_strategy: Panorama API key per tenant; SNMPv3 authPriv; all secrets in Vault; source IP allow-listed.
success_criteria: ≥90% subnet coverage; port/service inventory updated; policy anomalies flagged.
failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.
telemetry_schema_notes: network_findings(id uuid pk, tenant_id, ip inet, port int, svc text, severity text, meta jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Learn golden process baselines per host and alert on anomalies/drift.
data_sources: Lightweight Linux agent; SSH (fallback)
auth_strategy: Mutual‑TLS agent certs issued per tenant; certs in Vault PKI; strict revocation.
success_criteria: Baselines converge; meaningful anomalies <2% false positives; alerts delivered.
failure_modes: Agent heartbeat gaps; out-of-date baseline; clock skew; SSH fallback failure.
telemetry_schema_notes: proc_snapshots(host_id uuid, ts timestamptz, processes jsonb) + idx(host_id, ts)
expected_artifacts: Baseline snapshot, anomaly alerts, drift summary
rollback_plan: Freeze baseline version; suppress noisy signatures; re-learn window 24h.

purpose_output_goal: Provide tenant isolation, role-based access control, and audit logging for all services.
data_sources: Postgres (tenants, users, roles), Internal Admin API, Audit logger
auth_strategy: Vault AppRole for platform services; DB creds via Vault dynamic secrets (TTL 1h).
success_criteria: RBAC enforced; audit events for all admin actions; zero cross-tenant data leakage in tests.
failure_modes: Missing audit records; policy bypass; schema drift breaking auth; healthcheck failing.
telemetry_schema_notes: audit_logs(event_ts timestamptz, actor_id uuid, action text, target text, meta jsonb) with GIN(meta)
expected_artifacts: API healthchecks, RBAC policies, audit-log sample dataset
rollback_plan: Revert to last stable schema migration; disable new policy routes; restore last secrets version.

purpose_output_goal: Inventory Windows services/tasks and flag anomalous states and autostarts.
data_sources: WinRM, WMI, PowerShell Remoting
auth_strategy: AD delegated service account (JEA); secrets managed in Vault; PAM rotation.
success_criteria: Service/task inventory complete; start‑type/state drift flagged; low alert noise.
failure_modes: WinRM unreachable; RPC/COM failures; permissions denied.
telemetry_schema_notes: svc_inventory(host_id, svc_name, start_type, state, bin_path) + idx(host_id, svc_name)
expected_artifacts: Service inventory CSV, drift alerts, failures report; Raw svc_inventory export; Raw task_schedules export
rollback_plan: Retain last good inventory; mark host stale; reattempt next hour.

purpose_output_goal: Evaluate Windows servers against CIS 2019 L1 benchmarks; store evidence.
data_sources: WinRM/PowerShell, OSQuery (Windows build), Cloud Config APIs for IaaS
auth_strategy: Machine creds via AD or agent keys; Vault‑managed; rotation 60 days.
success_criteria: ≥95% controls evaluated; pass/fail computed; evidence exportable for audit.
failure_modes: Evidence missing; schema mismatch; agent gaps; timeout.
telemetry_schema_notes: control_evidence(control_id text, host_id uuid, result text, evidence jsonb, ts timestamptz) partitioned by day
expected_artifacts: Compliance CSV/PDF, evidence bundle, control summary; Raw compliance_results export; Raw control_evidence export
rollback_plan: Skip failing controls; keep last known pass; rescan overnight; alert GRC.

auth_strategy: Panorama API key per tenant; SNMPv3 authPriv; all secrets in Vault; source IP allow-listed.
success_criteria: ≥90% subnet coverage; port/service inventory updated; policy anomalies flagged.
failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.
telemetry_schema_notes: network_findings(id uuid pk, tenant_id, ip inet, port int, svc text, severity text, meta jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Map exposed services and policy misconfigurations across perimeter firewalls and DMZ.
data_sources: Panorama API, Nmap TCP/UDP, SNMPv3 on edge devices, MISP, OTX, NVD

failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.

expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export; Raw ti_events export; Raw ti_indicators export; Raw correlations export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Ingest IOCs from MISP and correlate with assets/findings to raise risk signals.
data_sources: MISP REST API, OTX, NVD CVE API
auth_strategy: API keys per tenant stored in Vault; request signing where supported; rotate every 90 days.
success_criteria: Feeds <15 min stale; correlation jobs produce matches; bounded alert volume.
failure_modes: Feed lag; parse errors; correlation stalled; quota exceeded.
telemetry_schema_notes: ti_indicators(type text, value text, source text, ts) + bloom filter on value
expected_artifacts: IOC freshness log, correlation summary, risk alerts
rollback_plan: Disable problematic feed; fall back to last indicators; retry with jitter; alert SecOps.

purpose_output_goal: Map exposed services and policy misconfigurations across perimeter firewalls and DMZ.
data_sources: Panorama API, Nmap TCP/UDP, SNMPv3 on edge devices, WinRM, OSQuery
auth_strategy: Machine creds or agent keys in Vault kv/tenants/<tenant>/grc
success_criteria: ≥90% subnet coverage; port/service inventory updated; policy anomalies flagged.
failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.
telemetry_schema_notes: network_findings(id uuid pk, tenant_id, ip inet, port int, svc text, severity text, meta jsonb); control_evidence(control_id text, host_id uuid, result text, evidence jsonb, ts timestamptz) partitioned by day
expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export; Raw compliance_results export; Raw control_evidence export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Enumerate users, groups, roles, risky sign-ins and privileged assignments from Entra ID.
data_sources: Microsoft Graph v1.0 (Users, Groups, DirectoryRoles, Audit), Sign-in logs
auth_strategy: OAuth2 client credentials with Entra app registration (least-privileged scopes); secrets in Vault.
success_criteria: ≥95% directory objects ingested; role assignments and risky states flagged with evidence.
failure_modes: Insufficient scopes; throttling; token expiry; API pagination errors.
telemetry_schema_notes: identity_users(id text primary key, tenant_id uuid, risk_level text, raw jsonb) + unique(tenant_id,id)
expected_artifacts: User/group CSV, role assignment report, risky exposure report; Raw identity_users export; Raw identity_groups export; Raw identity_roles export; Raw identity_findings export
rollback_plan: Preserve last good snapshot; reduce scope; backoff and retry; alert IAM on-call.

purpose_output_goal: Map exposed services and policy misconfigurations across perimeter firewalls and DMZ.
data_sources: Panorama API, Nmap TCP/UDP, SNMPv3 on edge devices
auth_strategy: Panorama API key per tenant; SNMPv3 authPriv; all secrets in Vault; source IP allow-listed.
success_criteria: ≥90% subnet coverage; port/service inventory updated; policy anomalies flagged.
failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.
telemetry_schema_notes: network_findings(id uuid pk, tenant_id, ip inet, port int, svc text, severity text, meta jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Discover accounts, resources, and misconfigurations across AWS Organizations.
data_sources: AWS Organizations, Config, Security Hub, IAM APIs
auth_strategy: Cross‑account IAM role with external ID; short‑lived creds; brokered via Vault AWS engine.
success_criteria: All target accounts reachable; throttling handled; misconfigs triaged.
failure_modes: Role trust broken; throttling >30m; API quota exceeded; region denies.
integration_endpoints: sts:AssumeRole (arn:aws:iam::<acct>:role/TenantraAudit), https://api.aws.amazon.com/; sts:AssumeRole arn:aws:iam::<acct>:role/TenantraAudit; https://management.azure.com/; https://api.aws.amazon.com/; https://cloudresourcemanager.googleapis.com/
telemetry_schema_notes: cloud_assets(account_id text, resource_arn text, config jsonb) + idx(account_id); aws_config_snapshots(raw jsonb) partition by day
expected_artifacts: Account inventory, misconfiguration report, throttle dashboard; Raw cloud_accounts export; Raw cloud_assets export; Raw cloud_findings export
rollback_plan: Pause offending account; keep last snapshot; retry with backoff; alert CloudOps.

expected_artifacts: Share inventory CSV, ACL findings report, sensitive paths list; Raw fs_paths export; Raw fs_acl export; Raw fs_findings export
rollback_plan: Keep last metadata snapshot; mark host stale; retry window 2h; alert Storage team.

expected_artifacts: Share inventory CSV, ACL findings report, sensitive paths list; Raw fs_paths export; Raw fs_acl export; Raw fs_findings export
rollback_plan: Keep last metadata snapshot; mark host stale; retry window 2h; alert Storage team.

purpose_output_goal: Map exposed services and policy misconfigurations across perimeter firewalls and DMZ.
data_sources: Panorama API, Nmap TCP/UDP, SNMPv3 on edge devices
auth_strategy: Panorama API key per tenant; SNMPv3 authPriv; all secrets in Vault; source IP allow-listed.
success_criteria: ≥90% subnet coverage; port/service inventory updated; policy anomalies flagged.
failure_modes: ACL blocks; scan budget exceeded; SNMP auth fail; API throttling.
telemetry_schema_notes: network_findings(id uuid pk, tenant_id, ip inet, port int, svc text, severity text, meta jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Open-port delta report, exposed service list, policy drift summary; Raw network_assets export; Raw network_findings export; Raw firewall_policies export
rollback_plan: Throttle probes; fall back to last inventory; requeue with backoff; notify NetOps.

purpose_output_goal: Learn golden process baselines per host and alert on anomalies/drift.
data_sources: Lightweight Linux agent; SSH (fallback)
auth_strategy: Mutual‑TLS agent certs issued per tenant; certs in Vault PKI; strict revocation.
success_criteria: Baselines converge; meaningful anomalies <2% false positives; alerts delivered.
failure_modes: Agent heartbeat gaps; out-of-date baseline; clock skew; SSH fallback failure.
telemetry_schema_notes: proc_snapshots(host_id uuid, ts timestamptz, processes jsonb) + idx(host_id, ts)
expected_artifacts: Baseline snapshot, anomaly alerts, drift summary
rollback_plan: Freeze baseline version; suppress noisy signatures; re-learn window 24h.

purpose_output_goal: Evaluate Windows servers against CIS 2019 L1 benchmarks; store evidence.

auth_strategy: Machine creds via AD or agent keys; Vault‑managed; rotation 60 days.

failure_modes: Evidence missing; schema mismatch; agent gaps; timeout.

expected_artifacts: Compliance CSV/PDF, evidence bundle, control summary; Raw compliance_results export; Raw control_evidence export
rollback_plan: Skip failing controls; keep last known pass; rescan overnight; alert GRC.

purpose_output_goal: Discover accounts, resources, and misconfigurations across AWS Organizations.
data_sources: AWS Organizations, Config, Security Hub, IAM APIs
auth_strategy: Cross‑account IAM role with external ID; short‑lived creds; brokered via Vault AWS engine.
success_criteria: All target accounts reachable; throttling handled; misconfigs triaged.
failure_modes: Role trust broken; throttling >30m; API quota exceeded; region denies.
telemetry_schema_notes: cloud_assets(account_id text, resource_arn text, config jsonb) + idx(account_id)
expected_artifacts: Account inventory, misconfiguration report, throttle dashboard; Raw cloud_accounts export; Raw cloud_assets export; Raw cloud_findings export
rollback_plan: Pause offending account; keep last snapshot; retry with backoff; alert CloudOps.

purpose_output_goal: Provide tenant isolation, role-based access control, and audit logging for all services.
data_sources: Postgres (tenants, users, roles), Internal Admin API, Audit logger
auth_strategy: Vault AppRole for platform services; DB creds via Vault dynamic secrets (TTL 1h).
success_criteria: RBAC enforced; audit events for all admin actions; zero cross-tenant data leakage in tests.
failure_modes: Missing audit records; policy bypass; schema drift breaking auth; healthcheck failing.
telemetry_schema_notes: audit_logs(event_ts timestamptz, actor_id uuid, action text, target text, meta jsonb) with GIN(meta)
expected_artifacts: API healthchecks, RBAC policies, audit-log sample dataset
rollback_plan: Revert to last stable schema migration; disable new policy routes; restore last secrets version.

purpose_output_goal: Baseline NetFlow or IPFIX telemetry and surface volumetric or pattern anomalies that may signal compromise.
data_sources: NetFlow or IPFIX collectors, SNMPv3 interface counters, sFlow exports
auth_strategy: Collector API token stored in Vault; SNMPv3 authPriv credentials rotated via NetOps PAM.
success_criteria: Baselines cover >=95% of managed devices; anomalies triaged within SLA; false positives <5%.
failure_modes: Collector offline; sampling misconfigured; SNMP polling denied; flow gap >10 minutes.
telemetry_schema_notes: netflow_anomalies(id uuid pk, device_id text, anomaly_type text, score numeric, window tsrange)
expected_artifacts: Anomaly digest, device heatmaps, flow context bundle; Raw netflow_anomalies export; Raw flow_baselines export
rollback_plan: Pause anomaly scoring; revert to last baseline snapshot; alert NetSec; replay queued telemetry.

purpose_output_goal: Compare access and distribution switch configurations against golden templates and security baselines.
data_sources: Network configuration backup repository, GitOps templates, device CLI via SSH
auth_strategy: Per-device TACACS service accounts with command ACL; session brokered through bastion; secrets in Vault.
success_criteria: All sampled switches parsed; drift classified; remediation tickets auto-created.
failure_modes: SSH unreachable; configuration parse errors; template repository sync failure; TACACS denial.
telemetry_schema_notes: config_drift_findings(device_id text, control_id text, severity text, diff jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Drift summary, per-device compliance diff, remediation ticket references; Raw network_configs export
rollback_plan: Reapply last approved template snapshot; notify change management; disable auto-remediation jobs.

purpose_output_goal: Validate router firmware versions against approved vendor advisories and publish remediation queues.
data_sources: SNMPv3 sysDescr or sysObjectID, vendor PSIRT API, CMDB device inventory
auth_strategy: SNMPv3 authPriv profiles unique per site; vendor API key stored in Vault kv/networks.
success_criteria: All critical routers enumerated; CVE coverage mapped; remediation due dates assigned.
failure_modes: SNMP blocked; vendor API unreachable; CMDB mismatch; OID parse failure.
telemetry_schema_notes: device_firmware_inventory(device_id text, version text, release_date date, support_status text)
expected_artifacts: Firmware gap report, vendor bulletin mapping, upgrade plan; Raw device_firmware_inventory export
rollback_plan: Freeze change tickets; retain previous firmware status snapshot; escalate to CAB.

purpose_output_goal: Ensure link aggregation bundles remain consistent in hashing, speed, and member state across core fabrics.
data_sources: SNMP LACP MIB, device API telemetry, syslog stream
auth_strategy: SNMPv3 credentials plus API tokens rotated via NetOps PAM; syslog collector uses mutual TLS certificates.
success_criteria: Bundle state change detected within two minutes; critical trunks auto-ticketed.
failure_modes: Collector miss; SNMP polling failure; syslog TLS break; bundle metadata mismatch.
telemetry_schema_notes: lacp_incidents(bundle_id text, detected_at timestamptz, status text, details jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Bundle stability trend, outage timeline, impacted VLAN list; Raw lacp_bundles export
rollback_plan: Disable alerting; retain previous stability metrics; inform NOC of monitoring gap.

purpose_output_goal: Review QoS class-maps and policy-maps for divergence from the sanctioned enterprise voice and video template.
data_sources: Device CLI via NETCONF or SSH, Git baseline of policy definitions, telemetry ingestion from NMS
auth_strategy: NETCONF over SSH using device certificates issued by NetPKI; Git access token stored in Vault.
success_criteria: Policy checksum matches baseline; deviations ticketed with context; voice queues prioritized.
failure_modes: Baseline missing; CLI parse failure; NETCONF session drop; configuration lock refusal.
telemetry_schema_notes: qos_drift_findings(device_id text, class_map text, delta jsonb, severity text)
expected_artifacts: QoS drift digest, impacted DSCP list, voice MOS risk summary; Raw qos_policies export
rollback_plan: Restore last approved QoS policy from configuration archive; notify change management.

purpose_output_goal: Verify campus wireless controllers maintain healthy AP joins, RF policy adherence, and RADIUS connectivity.
data_sources: WLC REST API, RADIUS test harness, syslog events
auth_strategy: Controller API service accounts scoped read-only; RADIUS shared secrets rotated quarterly via PAM.
success_criteria: AP join rate >=99%; authentication probes succeed; RF policies match standard profile.
failure_modes: Controller unreachable; RADIUS failure; AP join rate drop; API quota exhausted.
telemetry_schema_notes: wlc_health_snapshots(controller_id text, metric text, value numeric, ts timestamptz)
expected_artifacts: RF health report, auth probe log, AP outage digest; Raw wireless_findings export
rollback_plan: Suspend synthetic probes; revert to passive monitoring; alert WirelessOps leadership.

purpose_output_goal: Monitor DHCP scope utilization across core, branch, and wireless networks to prevent lease exhaustion.
data_sources: DHCP server API, Infoblox grid, SNMP scope statistics
auth_strategy: Infoblox API key stored in Vault; DHCP credentials via service principal; SNMPv3 credentials per scope.
success_criteria: Scopes maintain >=20% free pool; alerts fire before exhaustion; stale scopes flagged.
failure_modes: API query failure; SNMP permission denied; scope mismatch; replication lag.
telemetry_schema_notes: dhcp_scope_utilization(scope_id text, total_leases int, free_leases int, ts timestamptz)
expected_artifacts: Capacity forecast, hotspot alert list, remediation actions; Raw dhcp_scope_utilization export
rollback_plan: Fallback to weekly manual report; notify NetOps duty manager; disable auto-ticketing.

purpose_output_goal: Test RADIUS primary and secondary failover paths used by network devices and VPN concentrators.
data_sources: Synthetic authentication harness, TACACS logs, RADIUS server API
auth_strategy: Service account with MFA bypass restricted to test harness; secrets held in Vault; logging via TLS.
success_criteria: Primary path responds <500 ms; failover verified monthly; incidents routed to IAM operations.
failure_modes: Authentication rejection; timeout; certificate mismatch; policy misconfiguration.
telemetry_schema_notes: radius_tests(test_id uuid, result text, latency_ms int, path text, ts timestamptz)
expected_artifacts: Failover validation report, latency trend, incident tickets; Raw radius_tests export
rollback_plan: Disable synthetic authentication; alert IAM team; revert to manual monthly validation.

purpose_output_goal: Ensure network devices continuously forward syslog to the SIEM without gaps or TLS failures.
data_sources: Syslog collector ingestion metrics, device telemetry API, TLS certificate store
auth_strategy: Collector API token in Vault; device telemetry via SNMPv3; certificate store via PKI API.
success_criteria: Message loss <0.5%; TLS validity confirmed; backlog drained <2 minutes.
failure_modes: Collector backlog overflow; TLS expiry; SNMP unreachable; clock skew.
telemetry_schema_notes: syslog_delivery_stats(device_id text, messages_sent bigint, messages_lost bigint, ts timestamptz)
expected_artifacts: Delivery SLO dashboard, gap incident log, certificate expiry list; Raw syslog_delivery_stats export
rollback_plan: Suspend loss scoring; rely on collector alarms; inform SIEM engineering of the monitoring pause.

purpose_output_goal: Verify network infrastructure synchronizes to the approved NTP hierarchy and detect drift beyond SLA.
data_sources: SNMP NTP MIB, device CLI, NTP server health API
auth_strategy: SNMPv3 with read-only views; SSH limited command sets; NTP API token stored in Vault.
success_criteria: Offset <100 ms for core devices; NTP source approved; stratum within target.
failure_modes: SNMP blocked; CLI access denied; stratum mismatch; offset threshold exceeded.
telemetry_schema_notes: ntp_status_snapshots(device_id text, offset_ms numeric, stratum int, source text, ts timestamptz)
expected_artifacts: Clock drift report, rogue NTP source list, remediation tasks; Raw ntp_status_snapshots export
rollback_plan: Revert to quarterly manual audit; document potential drift risk; notify operations management.

purpose_output_goal: Assess access switch port-security configuration for compliance with MAC limits and sticky policies.
data_sources: Switch CLI, NAC policy database, MAC address telemetry
auth_strategy: SSH via bastion with RBAC; NAC API token stored per tenant; MAC telemetry via streaming collector.
success_criteria: All ports enforce desired policy; rogue MACs blocked; reporting accessible to NAC team.
failure_modes: CLI connection failure; NAC API outage; telemetry feed gap; unresolved policy mismatch.
telemetry_schema_notes: port_security_events(port_id text, mac text, action text, ts timestamptz)
expected_artifacts: Non-compliant port list, MAC violation feed, NAC ticket references; Raw port_security_configs export
rollback_plan: Suspend enforcement summary; rely on NAC dashboards; communicate delay to security operations.

purpose_output_goal: Monitor expected SNMP traps from critical devices and raise alerts when trap silence exceeds threshold.
data_sources: SNMP trap collector, device inventory, heartbeat schedule
auth_strategy: Trap collector uses mutual TLS; inventory database read-only credential; schedule configuration stored in Git.
success_criteria: Heartbeats align with schedule; silent devices investigated within SLA.
failure_modes: Collector outage; TLS handshake failure; inventory mismatch; schedule drift.
telemetry_schema_notes: snmp_trap_heartbeats(device_id text, last_seen timestamptz, expected_interval interval)
expected_artifacts: Trap silence dashboard, incident tickets, remediation checklist; Raw snmp_trap_heartbeats export
rollback_plan: Switch to daily manual trap review; notify NOC and security teams while monitoring is paused.

purpose_output_goal: Ensure nightly configuration backups run for routers, firewalls, and switches while validating integrity hashes.
data_sources: Backup system API, configuration archive, hash validation service
auth_strategy: Backup API token stored in Vault; hash service uses mutual TLS; archive kept on S3 with signed URLs.
success_criteria: Backup success >=99%; hashes verified; failed nodes automatically re-queued.
failure_modes: Backup job failure; S3 access denied; hash mismatch; API rate limit.
telemetry_schema_notes: config_backup_runs(device_id text, status text, hash text, completed_at timestamptz)
expected_artifacts: Backup compliance report, hash audit log, retry queue export; Raw config_backup_runs export
rollback_plan: Disable automatic retries; escalate to backup team; document risk of stale backups.

purpose_output_goal: Track IPsec and SSL VPN tunnel availability, capacity utilization, and cryptography compliance.
data_sources: VPN concentrator API, SNMP tunnel MIBs, syslog events
auth_strategy: API client certificates stored in Vault HSM; SNMPv3 authPriv credentials; syslog TLS collectors.
success_criteria: Tunnel uptime >=99%; crypto suites approved; capacity forecast published weekly.
failure_modes: API timeout; SNMP denied; certificate expired; data lag >5 minutes.
telemetry_schema_notes: vpn_tunnel_status(tunnel_id text, state text, uptime_seconds bigint, crypto_profile text, ts timestamptz)
expected_artifacts: Tunnel uptime report, capacity trend, crypto compliance checklist; Raw vpn_tunnel_status export
rollback_plan: Pause health probes; rely on concentrator native alarms; notify SOC on monitoring gap.

purpose_output_goal: Detect redundant or shadowed firewall rules and recommend cleanup to reduce attack surface.
data_sources: Firewall policy API, change management system, traffic logs
auth_strategy: Firewall API token scoped read-only; change system OAuth client; logs forwarded via syslog over TLS.
success_criteria: Shadow or duplicate rules identified; risk-ranked; remediation tickets created.
failure_modes: API unreachable; log gap; rule parse errors; change system outage.
telemetry_schema_notes: firewall_shadow_findings(rule_id text, finding_type text, severity text, evidence jsonb)
expected_artifacts: Shadow rule list, cleanup backlog, change references; Raw firewall_rule_inventory export
rollback_plan: Revert to quarterly manual review; inform governance board; hold automation efforts.

data_sources: PAM system API, approval workflow, session recordings
auth_strategy: PAM API token stored in Vault HSM; workflow webhooks signed; session metadata stored encrypted.
success_criteria: JIT requests approved before activation; sessions recorded; unused approvals revoked.
failure_modes: PAM outage; webhook failure; session metadata missing; approval bypass.
telemetry_schema_notes: jit_access_requests(request_id text, approver text, duration_minutes int, status text)
expected_artifacts: JIT compliance dashboard, unused request log, session review bundle; Raw jit_access_requests export
rollback_plan: Suspend monitoring; require manual JIT approvals; alert PAM administrators and SOC.

purpose_output_goal: Manage service account lifecycle, ensuring owners, rotation schedules, and least privilege.
data_sources: Service account registry, credential rotation logs, access reviews
auth_strategy: Registry API key in Vault; rotation logs pulled from PAM; access review data from GRC platform.
success_criteria: All service accounts have owners; rotations on schedule; inappropriate privileges flagged.
failure_modes: Registry unavailable; rotation log missing; review data stale; owner not found.
telemetry_schema_notes: service_account_registry(account_id text, owner text, rotation_interval int, privilege_score numeric)
expected_artifacts: Service account governance report, overdue rotation list, privilege remediation queue; Raw service_account_registry export
rollback_plan: Fallback to manual registry spreadsheet; inform compliance; track gap in IAM charter.

purpose_output_goal: Correlate identity threat signals (impossible travel, spray attacks) and dispatch to SOC.
data_sources: Azure AD risky users, Okta risk events, SIEM correlation rules
auth_strategy: API tokens stored in Vault; correlation service uses mutual TLS; outputs to SOC incident API.
success_criteria: Threat events delivered <5 minutes; suppression for known benign; SOC acknowledges alerts.
failure_modes: API quota exceeded; correlation failure; SOC queue error; false positive spike.
telemetry_schema_notes: identity_threat_events(event_id text, user_id text, risk_score numeric, detected_at timestamptz)
expected_artifacts: Identity threat incident queue, analyst playbook link, suppression log; Raw identity_threat_events export
rollback_plan: Pause hub; rely on native identity providers; notify SOC and identity teams of decreased coverage.

purpose_output_goal: Confirm MFA enforcement across applications, VPNs, and privileged tools.
data_sources: Application RBAC configs, VPN gateway policies, PAM enforcement logs
auth_strategy: API tokens stored in Vault; MFA status retrieved via IdP; enforcement logs via syslog TLS.
success_criteria: All critical apps require MFA; gaps prioritized; remediation tracked.
failure_modes: API auth failure; IdP data stale; log ingestion delay; scope missing.
telemetry_schema_notes: mfa_enforcement_inventory(app_id text, mfa_required boolean, owner text, updated_at timestamptz)
expected_artifacts: MFA enforcement report, gap backlog, remediation plan; Raw mfa_enforcement_inventory export
rollback_plan: Pause validator; rely on quarterly manual check; inform security leadership of temporary gap.

purpose_output_goal: Monitor adoption of passwordless authentication and highlight blockers.

success_criteria: Adoption trend meets target; blockers categorized; support backlog highlighted.

expected_artifacts: Passwordless adoption dashboard, blocker backlog, stakeholder brief; Raw passwordless_metrics export
rollback_plan: Switch to weekly adoption report; notify program sponsor; document pause in change log.

purpose_output_goal: Validate dynamic access policies based on device posture and location remain effective.

success_criteria: Policy evaluations succeed; deviations flagged; false positive rate low.

telemetry_schema_notes: dynamic_policy_findings(policy_id text, condition text, status text, detected_at timestamptz)
expected_artifacts: Dynamic policy validation report, remediation actions, exception list; Raw dynamic_policy_inventory export
rollback_plan: Pause validator; rely on IdP alerts; inform zero trust working group.

purpose_output_goal: Ensure identity lifecycle playbooks execute for joiner, mover, and leaver events.

auth_strategy: Workflow API key stored in Vault; HR feed via secure SFTP; ticketing integration uses OAuth.
success_criteria: Playbooks run within SLA; exceptions auto-ticketed; metrics visible to stakeholders.

telemetry_schema_notes: lifecycle_playbook_runs(event_id text, playbook text, status text, completed_at timestamptz)
expected_artifacts: Lifecycle SLA report, exception backlog, stakeholder summary; Raw lifecycle_playbook_runs export
rollback_plan: Fallback to manual lifecycle tracking; notify HRIT; document SLA risk.

purpose_output_goal: Verify that access requests require appropriate approvals and evidence before provisioning.

success_criteria: Requests without approvals flagged; evidence attachments verified; auto-provisioning blocked.

purpose_output_goal: Detect unusual access patterns leveraging identity analytics and session telemetry.
data_sources: Identity analytics platform, session telemetry, UEBA scores

success_criteria: High severity anomalies escalated within 30 minutes; analyst feedback captured.

purpose_output_goal: Compare HR roster to system accounts and reconcile discrepancies nightly.
